languages.text: "Я... не избегаю их. Я просто не хочу произносить вслух то, что подразумевалось с самого начала".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс проводит ладонью по лицу.{/n} "Я... не избегаю их. Я просто не хочу произносить вслух то, что подразумевалось с самого начала... нас".

languages.text: "I'm not... avoiding it. I just don't want to say out loud what has been obvious from the very beginning."
languages.original_text: "Я... не избегаю их. Я просто не хочу произносить вслух то, что подразумевалось с самого начала".

languages.text: “我并不是在……逃避。只是那些事情从一开始就已经很明显了，我并不想大声说出来。”
languages.original_text: "I'm not... avoiding it. I just don't want to say out loud what has been obvious from the very beginning."

traits.locale_text: “我并不是在……逃避。只是那些事情从一开始就已经很明显了，我并不想大声说出来。”

languages.text: «No estoy... evitándolo, pero no quiero decir en voz alta algo que es evidente desde el principio».
languages.original_text: "I'm not... avoiding it. I just don't want to say out loud what has been obvious from the very beginning."

traits.locale_text: «No estoy... evitándolo, pero no quiero decir en voz alta algo que es evidente desde el principio».

languages.text: 「避けてるわけじゃない。ただ、最初から明らかだったことを口に出して言いたくないだけだ」
languages.original_text: "I'm not... avoiding it. I just don't want to say out loud what has been obvious from the very beginning."

traits.locale_text: 「避けてるわけじゃない。ただ、最初から明らかだったことを口に出して言いたくないだけだ」

languages.text: « Je... ne cherche pas à l'éviter. J'estime simplement qu'il est inutile de dire à voix haute ce qui est évident depuis le début. »
languages.original_text: "I'm not... avoiding it. I just don't want to say out loud what has been obvious from the very beginning."

traits.locale_text: « Je... ne cherche pas à l'éviter. J'estime simplement qu'il est inutile de dire à voix haute ce qui est évident depuis le début. »

languages.text: "Ich ... vermeide es nicht. Ich möchte nur nicht laut aussprechen, was von Anfang an offensichtlich war."
languages.original_text: "I'm not... avoiding it. I just don't want to say out loud what has been obvious from the very beginning."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... vermeide es nicht. Ich möchte nur nicht laut aussprechen, was von Anfang an offensichtlich war."

languages.text: "Ben... Kaçınmıyorum. Yalnızca en başından beri aşikâr olan şeyi yüksek sesle söylemek istemiyorum."
languages.original_text: "I'm not... avoiding it. I just don't want to say out loud what has been obvious from the very beginning."
